basics.name: Jensen Huang
basics.headline: Product Manager of Parallel Possibilities
basics.location: Santa Clara, CA (often found on Mars)

summary.name: Professional Summary
summary.content: Inventive product leader who once finished a capstone on a commuter rocket ride. I translate cosmic-scale ideas into launch-ready experiences, aligning engineers, marketers, and sentient toasters with equal patience. Obsessed with useful AI, ergonomic GPUs, and writing product specs that make people chuckle and ship.

items.summary:
Owns an experimental “meeting without gravity” platform that lets remote teams whiteboard in 3D. Balances GPU demand with human attention spans.

  • Shipped auto-transcription for zero-gravity scribbles, improving meeting recall by 42% without any floating markers lost in space.

  • Piloted sentiment-boost alerts that nudge moderators when morale dips; internal NPS climbed from 48 to 72 in two quarters.

  • Coordinated launch with hardware, legal, and Martian customs—first product to clear orbital compliance paperwork on the first try.

Led discovery for the solar system's premier streaming service for orbital tourists.

  • Launched dynamic bandwidth throttling that adapts to meteor showers, cutting stream drop-offs by 33%.

  • Introduced an AI curator nicknamed “PopcornBot” that tripled engagement with micro-documentaries about moon volcanoes.

  • Mentored a team of four APMs; two now run product for Pluto's weather channel beta.

Rotational APM on an AI-first fintech squad helping founders fund cosmic ventures.

  • Designed a realtime dashboard for asteroid mining startups, shrinking reporting time from six hours to twenty minutes.

  • Partnered with compliance to humanize risk messaging; decreased support tickets about “galactic audits” by 55%.

  • Co-led quarterly roadmap reviews with Jensen-in-the-Loop simulations to test investor reactions.

Started as the team's resident spreadsheet sorcerer and slowly automated himself into product.

  • Mapped onboarding frictions and proposed feature flags that lifted activation by 18% for interplanetary customers.

  • Built the first KPI cockpit using GPUs in the conference room; engineering adopted it as the canonical source of truth.

  • Presented monthly “How to interpret Martian user feedback” sessions—localization score rose to 95%.

Wrangled rover telemetry and snack-bar surveys to forecast campus energy needs.

  • Introduced GPU-accelerated dashboards during a dorm blackout; energy planning error margin dropped by 21%.

  • Automated weekly reporting with Python scripts named after favorite sci-fi authors; saved the team 12 hours per sprint.

  • Presented findings to the Dean in a borrowed spacesuit after forgetting the indoor tie.

items.name: GPU-Powered Espresso Queue
items.description: Smart queueing app ensuring the espresso machine never idles during product sprints.
items.summary: Used computer vision and an old dev kit to predict latte demand; adopted across three NVIDIA campuses.

items.name: Martian Rover OKR Tracker
items.description: Goal tracking app for student robotics teams navigating low gravity.
items.summary: Co-created playful OKR templates (“Objective: don't flip over”), improving weekly check-ins by 45%.

items.institution: Community College of the Planet Mars
items.summary: Captain of the GPU overclocking club; co-founded the Anti-Dust Coalition for better rover maintenance.
Thesis: “Why every roadmap needs a warp-drive contingency”. Class speaker voted “Most likely to whiteboard during vacation”.

items.title: Best Use of a GPU in a Meeting
items.summary: Recognized for literally placing a GPU on the table to accelerate brainstorming physics sims.
Mentor student teams designing life-support dashboards that even nervous astronauts understand.

css.value: @media print { body { font-size: 10px !important; line-height: 1.2 !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; } .header { margin-top: 0 !important; padding-top: 0 !important; } .section { margin-bottom: 6px !important; padding: 0 !important; } .experience-item, .project-item { margin-bottom: 4px !important; } ul { margin: 2px 0 !important; padding-left: 16px !important; } li { margin-bottom: 1px !important; } .skills-section { margin-bottom: 2px !important; } h1, h2, h3 { margin: 0 0 4px 0 !important; } } body { font-size: 11px !important; line-height: 1.3 !important; } .section { margin-bottom: 8px !important; } .experience-item, .project-item { margin-bottom: 6px !important; } ul { margin: 4px 0 !important; } li { margin-bottom: 2px !important; } .skills-section { margin-bottom: 4px !important; }
